(N95/PAPR, surgical mask) h. Did you wear eye protection for all encounters with this/these patients (before the patient was placed on enhanced respiratory isolation)? (yes, no) i. Did you interact with the patient(s) outside of their room? (yes, no) m. Did the patient(s) cough in your face at any time? (yes, no) n. Did you examine the oropharynx of this/these patient(s)? (yes, no) o. Did you place an NG or OG tube? (yes, no) p. Did you help roll a patient to clean them, change bed sheets, shift positions, etc.? (yes, no)
